# NSFocusRingType.none

**Case**

No focus ring.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

If you set the focus ring type to this value, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] do not draw any focus ring.

## Constants

- **NSFocusRingType.default**: The default focus ring type for a view or cell.
- **NSFocusRingType.exterior**: The standard Aqua focus ring.
